local_schema.longdesc: If this key is set a first run welcome message will be presented.
If this key is set the main update list window will show version information (from version to version).

local_schema.short_desc: Auto close the install window after successful install
local_schema.longdesc: If this key is set the install window will be automatically closed on successful installation.
This key is deprecated in favour of the file /etc/update-manager/release-upgrades Check automatically if a new version of the current distribution is available and offer to upgrade (if possible).
Stores the size of the update-manager dialogue
Stores the state of the expander that contains the list of changes and the description

local_schema.short_desc: Remind to reload the channel list
local_schema.longdesc: If automatic checking for updates is disabled, you have to reload the channel list manually. This option allows to hide the reminder shown in this case.
Pango font description for subtitle rendering
Maximum amount of data to decode before displaying (in seconds)
Amount of data to buffer for network streams before starting to display the stream (in seconds)
Sound volume, in percent, between 0 and 100

local_schema.short_desc: Whether the main window should stay on top
local_schema.longdesc: Whether the main window should stay on top of the other ones

local_schema.short_desc: Type of audio output to use
local_schema.longdesc: Type of audio output to use: "0" for stereo, "1" for 4-channel output, "2" for 5.0 channel output, "3" for 5.1 channel output, "4" for AC3 Passthrough.

local_schema.short_desc: Whether to enable debug for the playback engine
Resize the canvas automatically on file load
Name of the visual effects plugins
Show visual effects when no video is displayed
local_schema.longdesc: Show visual effects when playing an audio only file.
